tool_description: Official BizToc.com API — The Web's most comprehensive hub for business & finance news.
name: BizToc
title: BizToc

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search across the entire news index from the last 14 days. Note that no search operators are supported via the API so all provided terms are considered required.

api_list.name: News / Latest / Page
api_list.description: Get the latest news stories in chronological order, filtered by `{page_id}`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/news/latest/main"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/news/latest/{page_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: News / Latest
api_list.description: Get the latest news stories in chronological order, across all pages. Akin to the /live view on biztoc.com.

api_list.name: News / Source
api_list.description: Get the latest news stories for the respective `{source_id}` in chronological order.

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: News / Current

api_list.name: News / Hot
api_list.description: Get trending topic clusters and their respective stories, ordered by a proprietary popularity algorithm. Akin to the /hot view on biztoc.com. The topics and stories will change every 15 minutes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/news/hot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sources
api_list.description: Lists all currently available `{source_id}`s. Equivalent of news blocks on biztoc.com. Note that certain proprietary blocks like Twitter or Stock Tickers are not available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tags / Trending
api_list.description: Get list of trending tags for `{page_id}`, sorted by popularity. The `{tag}` can be used for the **Tag/News** endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/tags/main"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Pages
api_list.description: Get the list of avilable `{page_id}`s. Akin to the /crypto and /media sites on biztoc.com. Required parameter for endpoints like **Tags/Trending**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biztoc.p.rapidapi.com/pages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biztoc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
